description:
Brook finds himself totally at the whim of Big Mom, and comes face to face with her brutal love! Meanwhile, Pedro reveals his explosive plan to create a distraction!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Auf zu Sanji! – Ruffys Sprint zum Gegenangriff!
Para alcanzar a Sanji. ¡El ataque de venganza de Luffy!
Sanji de retour. La grande contre-attaque de Luffy !
Sanji no Moto e: Luffy Gyakushuu no Dai Gekisou!
To Reach Sanji! Luffy`s Vengeful Hell-bent Dash!
Verso Sanji. Il grande contrattacco furioso di Luffy!
サンジの元へ ルフィ逆襲の大激走!
